input:
Alice, Bob, and Claire are playing a game. At the start of the game, they are each holding a ball: Alice has a orange ball, Bob has a red ball, and Claire has a black ball.
As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Alice and Bob swap balls. Then, Claire and Bob swap balls. Finally, Alice and Claire swap balls. At the end of the game, Claire has the
Options:
(A) orange ball
(B) red ball
(C) black ball
